description: It happens quite often that people don´t like my offers. But fortunately it doesn´t happen too often that guys call me a "faggot". Especially as all started quite promising. The guy coming for the job-interview looked simply great. He was well-built and in his mid-twenties. I already thought about all the things I would do which him when he let me down in that unfriendly way. However, the second one was also not bad. Not bad at all. He looked much younger and cuter. He spoke German and some English. And I could already see him serving as a bartender, the job this interview was about.     But then there was the 5 000 CZK one-time-fee for our agency. He was really not able to pay it. Good news for me. All I had to do now was to convince him about stripping naked instead.
title: Dirty Scout 61
